lesson.page: You have just created one food chain within the rainforest ecosystem. In fact the rainforest is made up of complex feeding interactions between many animals in plants. This is represented by a food web.
As energy passes through the food web, some is lost at every level as the plants and animals use it to live.
Now it is your turn to create a food web that shows the flow of energy between plants and animals in the rainforest ecosystem.
